body_html:
Dear Soumith, " Wondering if you installed your PyTorch a bit before than 3 days, 12 hours ago -- but opened an issue 2 days ago. If that's not the case, I'll investigate further.": correct, I installed it a few days before raising the issue. As far a I am concerned, the issue can be closed. Yours, Bruno Le 02-09-18 à 05:08, Soumith Chintala a écrit :
…
we fixed this with newly issued binaries 3 days and 12 hours ago. PyTorch no longer installs or depends on |cudatoolkit == 9|. I'm surprised that your |conda| didn't install our updated binaries (you reported the issue 2 days ago). Wondering if you installed your PyTorch a bit before than 3 days, 12 hours ago -- but opened an issue 2 days ago. If that's not the case, I'll investigate further. Thanks for reporting. — You are receiving this because you authored the thread. Reply to this email directly, view it on GitHub <#11138 (comment)>, or mute the thread <https://github.com/notifications/unsubscribe-auth/AOQSR7CpHf5M2C9AKUNBLiRhxQigipneks5uW0uUgaJpZM4WU8Mr>.
body_text:
Dear Soumith,

" Wondering if you installed your PyTorch a bit before than 3 days, 12
hours ago -- but opened an issue 2 days ago. If that's not the case,
I'll investigate further.": correct, I installed it a few days before
raising the issue. As far a I am concerned, the issue can be closed.

Yours,

Bruno

Le 02-09-18 à 05:08, Soumith Chintala a écrit :
…

 we fixed this with newly issued binaries 3 days and 12 hours ago.
 PyTorch no longer installs or depends on |cudatoolkit == 9|.

 I'm surprised that your |conda| didn't install our updated binaries
 (you reported the issue 2 days ago). Wondering if you installed your
 PyTorch a bit before than 3 days, 12 hours ago -- but opened an issue
 2 days ago. If that's not the case, I'll investigate further.

 Thanks for reporting.

 —
 You are receiving this because you authored the thread.
 Reply to this email directly, view it on GitHub
 <#11138 (comment)>,
 or mute the thread
 <https://github.com/notifications/unsubscribe-auth/AOQSR7CpHf5M2C9AKUNBLiRhxQigipneks5uW0uUgaJpZM4WU8Mr>.
body:
Dear Soumith,

" Wondering if you installed your PyTorch a bit before than 3 days, 12 
hours ago -- but opened an issue 2 days ago. If that's not the case, 
I'll investigate further.": correct, I installed it a few days before 
raising the issue. As far a I am concerned, the issue can be closed.

Yours,

Bruno
